entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
